CustomField.description: This formula field generates a code based on the value selected in the ampi__Policy_Significance__c picklist.
CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(ampi__Policy_Significance__c), 'Not targeted',0, 'Significant objective',1, 'Principal objective',2, 'Principal objective AND in support of an action programme',3, 'Explicit primary objective',4, null )
CustomField.label: Policy Significance Code
